name: Die Inside The Galaxy Goose
description:
Itch.io web player doesn't support the videos in our game! Go check the game with cutscenes from: https://latchbackgames.github.io/GMTK22/ . The build version is the same as in here and will not be updated further than this submission.

According to the legend, The Galaxy Goose is older than the universe itself.  You have found an opportunity to play dice with it.  Unfortunately,  the Goose swallowed the die, and now you have to get it out.   Follow the journey of the die inside the Galaxy Goose and survive the obstacles on the way. 

Die Inside the Galaxy Goose is a strategic platformer  game with elements of dice games. The core gameplay is to yeet dice inside the Galaxy Goose to overcome obstacles and using as few dice as possible to pass level (not that we are keeping scores). 

The same color die and obstacle will destroy each other. If the die and obstacle are of different colors, only the die will get destroyed. Some obstacles are transparent and can be passed through by a die of the same color. By bouncing the die by the wall, the die will change the color.  

Controls: 

Mouse - aiming
Left click - choosing and throwing die 
Escape - reset the die or reset the game 

Music:
50 over speed limit - HolzinaCC0 from Free Music Archive

Sound effects:
Fairy arcade sparkle - mixkit
Horror lose - mixkit
Fairy cartoon success voice - mixkit
Wood hard hit - mixkit
Tech break fail - mixkit
